nodes.text: The Biravians were a group indigenous to the Biravia system. In 20 BBY, a Biravian female expressed her disdain for Jedi when she was stopped by Kal Skirata at a clone trooper checkpoint in Galactic City.

A Biravian character appears in Order 66: A Republic Commando Novel, written by Karen Traviss and published by Del Rey in 2008. The novel fails to indicate whether Biravian refers to a sentient species or some other social group.
